sentences.en: a woman who is energetic and resourceful
sentences.cn: 精力充沛且足智多谋的女人

sentences.en: At any event, nobody could trick even once somebody as resourceful and tough as Dinitz.
sentences.cn: 但无论如何, 对于象迪尼茨这样足智多谋和难以对付的人来说,欺诈手法既使只使用一次也不会得逞.

sentences.en: Candidates should be responsible, resourceful and enjoy software development.
sentences.cn: 应征者必须重责任感 、 智谋广、及享爱软体开发.

sentences.en: Cao Cao, a wise and resourceful army officer , had long wanted to kill Dong Zhuo.
sentences.cn: 校尉曹操, 足智多谋并早有杀董卓之心.

sentences.en: Confident, creative and resourceful, they should also value honesty and hard work.
sentences.cn: 他们对自己有信心, 具创造力, 同时诚实勤奋.

sentences.en: During those difficult years, my mother was very resourceful.
sentences.cn: 在那些艰难的日子里, 我母亲倒很有办法.

sentences.en: He is very clever and endlessly resourceful.
He was amazingly inventive and resourceful, and played a major role in my career.
sentences.cn: 他极具创造力，而且足智多谋，在我的职业生涯中起到了重要的作用。

sentences.en: He was so cool, deep, dynamic, in a way resourceful, like herself.
sentences.cn: 他是那么冷静, 深刻, 有生气, 在某一点上很机智, 象她自己一样.

sentences.en: One intelligent, determined woman reporter was more resourceful.
sentences.cn: 一位聪明果敢的女记者更加足智多谋.

sentences.en: One of the driest places on Earth, the Namib necessitates resourceful adaptations.
sentences.cn: 纳米比沙漠是世界上最干燥的地方之一, 在这里生活必然需要多种适应性.

sentences.en: Plasmas have shown themselves to be very resourceful at avoiding lengthy confinement.
sentences.cn: 等离子体本身在避免长度约束方面表现得很灵活多样.

sentences.en: Remember, Bevy is a very brilliant and resourceful girl.
sentences.cn: 记住, 白妃是个非常聪明而有才干的姑娘.

sentences.en: She is calm and resourceful in an emergency.
sentences.cn: 她在紧急关头总是沉着机敏.

sentences.en: What is immediately striking is how resourceful the children are.
sentences.cn: 最令人注目的是孩子们的机智聪明.

trans.tran_cn: 资源丰富的，富于机智的，有策略的，灵活多样，善于随机应变，诡计多端的，鬼点子很多的，有本领
trans.tran_en: good at finding ways of dealing with practical problems
